name: Metropolitan School District Of Steuben County

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Metropolitan School District Of Steuben County is a Local Education Agency (LEA) provider based in Angola, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $240K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.
